description: Use the `akamai_appsec_security_policy_protections` resource to create or modify ...

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

ApplyApiConstraints.description: Whether to enable api constraints: either `true` or `false`.

ApplyApplicationLayerControls.description: Whether to enable application layer controls: either `true` or `false`.

ApplyBotmanControls.description: Whether to enable botman controls: either `true` or `false`.

ApplyNetworkLayerControls.description: Whether to enable network layer controls: either `true` or `false`.

ApplyRateControls.description: Whether to enable rate controls: either `true` or `false`.

ApplyReputationControls.description: Whether to enable reputation controls: either `true` or `false`.

ApplySlowPostControls.description: Whether to enable slow post controls: either `true` or `false`.

ConfigId.description: The ID of the security configuration to use.

SecurityPolicyId.description: The ID of the security policy to use.

Version.description: The version number of the security configuration to use.
